name: Battle Realms + Winter of the Wolf

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Battle Realms + Winter of the Wolf/Battle_Realms_F.exe

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

task.args: /SILENT /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI /DIR="C:/GOG Games/Battle Realms + Winter of the Wolf"
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Battle Realms + Winter of the Wolf/Battle_Realms_F.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SILENT /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI /DIR="C:/GOG Games/Battle
      Realms + Winter of the Wolf"
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
